title: TPG Takes $600 Million Hit on ‘Eyebrow Queen’ Cosmetics Bet
description: TPG Inc. exited most of its stake in Anastasia Beverly Hills as part of a debt restructuring, largely wiping out the private equity firm’s $600 million investment in the cosmetics company, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: TPG Inc. exited most of its stake in Anastasia Beverly Hills as part of a debt restructuring, largely wiping out the private equity firm’s $600 million investment in the cosmetics company, according to people familiar with the matter.
